The Ministry retains the right to terminate the contract at any time without giving.any
notice and ilso without assigning any reasons. Some of the situations under which
the Ministry may terminate the contract are:-
(i)
The Consultant is unable to address the assigned work.

(iii) The Consultant is found lacking in honesty and integrity.
